idea:
PIIRITU INNOVATIONS PVT. LTD, is a start-up owned and managed by experienced finance professionals. Our mission is to bring efficiency in every activity whether commercial or non-commercial.

Eff Factor stands for Efficiency Factor. Eff Factor is a time and project management software with a focus on profit. This is our first innovative offering . It comes in 4 versions to cater to different requirements.

We believe in a process of evolution for Eff Factor in which everybody participates most importantly you.

We believe Eff Factor will truly give you “Wisdom Ahead of Time”
name: PIIRITU INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are the founding team of an ambitious fintech start-up - Jify, a financial wellness platform for the employed workforce. Jify is a b2b2C offering focused on democratising access to wages /"wage streaming" - enables employees to access their salary real-time and instantaneously. Jify integrates with payroll systems enabling companies to offer salary advances to employees at 0 cost or risk for the employer. Jify also offers a prepaid card (with rewards & easy budgeting) and financial education & wellness tools
name: ZEO FIN TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Starting free online Google Meet/Zoom meet lessons for economically backward students. Also to get the guide the student who can pay fees as per the subject, Curriculum and the grades.

The following Curriculum, Grades and subjects will be guided online

Free as well as paid who can affort the fees


IBDP

IGCSE

MYP

AS/A- Level

ISC

ICSE

CBSE

State boards

NIOS

SNDP


The Grade will start from 6th to 12th 


10% fees collected will be used for the free education of economically backward students.
